summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System, and providing for the acquisition by condemnation of Lot Two (2) and a portion of Lot One (1), Block Sixty-seven (67), Lake Union Shore Lands, as a site for the construction of the water intake connecting the Lake Union Auxiliary Steam Plant with Lake Union, and for storing fuel thereon, as contemplated by Ordinance No. 50049, and providing for the ascertainment and payment of just compensation to be made therefor.
